Wellington Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences

Find information and resources for staff and postgraduate students in the Wellington Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences.

Research and conference leave

If you’re involved in research, you can get help with planning and research strategies, applying for funding, contract management, budget advice and much more.

Committees and boards

WFHSS has a number of boards and committees that ensure the quality of programmes, teaching and research.

Faculty staff

Meet the staff in the Office of the Pro-Vice-Chancellor of WFHSS and WFoE, the Office of the Dean of WFHSS, and the WFHSS Student and Academic Services Office.

Strategy and policies

The WFHSS Strategic Plan, plus links to University-wide strategies, statutes, policies and procedures.

Communications and marketing

The WFHSS Communications and Marketing team is your first port of call for publications, social media, media, internal comms, events, marketing, and websites.

Student and academic services

The SASO office has a range of responsibilities and services that cover all student and academic related matters.

Resources for teaching and learning online

Resources for teaching and learning online provided by Faculty staff.
